title: Constantin Mihail
text: Constantin "Titi" Gheorghe Mihail (July 24, 1945 – January 22, 2016) was a Romanian <a href="track%20and%20field">track and field</a> coach. He is considered one of the most important promoters of male <a href="Sprint%20%28running%29">sprinting</a>, <a href="hurdling">hurdling</a>, <a href="long%20jump">long jump</a> and <a href="triple%20jump">triple jump</a> events. Mihail had a significant role in restructuring the <a href="Romanian%20Athletics%20Federation">Romanian Athletics Federation</a> in the <a href="Romanian%20Revolution">post-communist</a> period.
